A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What an "udder" disaster.  Not a Star Wars movie.  Rian Johnson decided to give a giant middle finger to anyone who had an emotional investment in the saga.  Worst Star Wars movie to date.  Ewok Adventure and Battle for Endor much better than this garbage.

Extremely disappointed that someone decided to approve this script and release this movie.

This guy has a great petition going to strike this abomination from the canon and remake it.
